SlashCommand(/sp.constitution Update constitution.md to reflect Hackathon II Phase III requirements exactly: 1) OpenAI Agents SDK (not Claude SDK), 2) Official MCP SDK with exactly 5 tools (add_task, list_tasks, complete_task, delete_task, update_task), 3) OpenAI ChatKit frontend, 4) Stateless FastAPI endpoint architecture, 5) Database-backed conversation state (Conversation & Message models), 6) GPT-4-turbo model with temperature 0.7, 7) Phase III extends phase-2/ directory structure, 8) Conversation storage with full message history, 9) MCP tools are stateless and query database directly, 10) All Basic Level features (Add, Delete, Update, View, Mark Complete) must work via natural language through chatbot.)

SlashCommand(/sp.specify Create comprehensive Phase III specification for AI-Powered Todo Chatbot with: 1) OpenAI Agents SDK integration (GPT-4-turbo, temperature 0.7), 2) Official MCP SDK with exactly 5 stateless tools (add_task, list_tasks, complete_task, delete_task, update_task), 3) Stateless FastAPI POST /api/{user_id}/chat endpoint, 4) Database-backed conversation state (Conversation & Message models), 5) OpenAI ChatKit frontend integration, 6) Natural language command patterns from Hackathon II, 7) Basic Level features (Add, Delete, Update, View, Mark Complete) all accessible via chatbot, 8) Error handling and graceful degradation, 9) Conversation history persistence, 10) User isolation and JWT authentication inheritance from Phase II.)

SlashCommand(/sp.plan Create detailed Phase III implementation plan with: 1) Phase 0 Research (MCP SDK investigation, OpenAI Agents SDK patterns, stateless architecture decisions), 2) Phase 1 Design (Database schema finalization, API contract specification, MCP tool JSON schemas), 3) Phase 2 Database (Alembic migrations, Conversation and Message models, indexes), 4) Phase 3 MCP Tools (5 stateless tools with database access), 5) Phase 4 Agent Service (OpenAI Agents SDK wrapper, gpt-4-turbo initialization, tool invocation), 6) Phase 5 Chat Endpoint (POST /api/{user_id}/chat, conversation history management, stateless request cycle), 7) Phase 6 Frontend (ChatKit integration, API client), 8) Phase 7 Testing (unit tests, integration tests, agent behavior validation). Timeline: 8 days to Dec 21, 2025. All requirements from Hackathon II Phase III spec.)

SlashCommand(/sp.tasks Generate 40 actionable Phase III implementation tasks organized by epic: Epic 1 (Database - 5 tasks): Create Alembic migration, SQLModel models, indexes, apply migration, verify schema. Epic 2 (MCP Tools - 8 tasks): MCP server setup, add_task tool, list_tasks tool, complete_task tool, delete_task tool, update_task tool, tool testing, error handling. Epic 3 (Agent Service - 6 tasks): OpenAI client setup, system prompt design, tool registration, agent initialization, tool invocation logic, response formatting. Epic 4 (Chat Endpoint - 8 tasks): Endpoint routing, request validation, conversation history retrieval, message storage, agent execution, response generation, error handling, rate limiting. Epic 5 (Frontend - 9 tasks): ChatKit setup, message input component, message display component, API client, conversation state, typing indicators, error UI, loading states, accessibility. Epic 6 (Testing & Polish - 4 tasks): Unit tests for models/tools/agent, integration tests for chat flow, agent behavior validation, demo video creation. All tasks must have acceptance criteria, file paths, dependencies, and points. Deadline: December 21, 2025.)
